Web app for calculating and visualizing fractals.

Riemann Hypothesis Verification Spring 2015

Tools to computationally verify the Riemann Hypothesis for trillions of zeros and the statistical analysis of the zeros of the Riemann Zeta function and the spectra of random Hermitian matrices.

Julia C++ OpenMP LAPACK data analysis


Topic Modeling Winter 2016

Investigation of large corpora topic modeling algorithms inspired by nonnegative matrix factorization.

Hand Writing Recognition Neural Net Summer 2015

Command line utility for training a neural net using the MNIST dataset written in C++.
